directions: Toss first 4 ingredients in large bowl. Whisk oil and lemon juice in small bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Drizzle dressing over salad; toss to coat. Divide salad among plates. Using vegetable peeler, shave curls of Parmesan atop each salad and serve.
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups (lightly packed) fresh basil leaves, torn
1 1/2 cups corn kernels (cut from about 2 small ears)
title: Arugula, Corn, and Tomato Salad with Shaved Parmesan
